39274526.review:
It wasnt anything special. I was expecting a storyline that would blow me away but it was not that great. Certainly the lack of gameplay added to this negative review because honestly the whole journey was pretty boring. The only puzzles that were good are in episode 2 the rest are super staight forward and simple and linear. Any tense situations are resolved rather quickly by either running away or hitting enter until the dialouge is done. Also the game would force you to save before any of these tense situations occured, which kind of took you out of the immersion and took away from the surprise/horror of the situation "oh a save... i'm gonna be in danger now" type of thing. Another negative, the point where the story gets really exciting and intense, where alot of expostion is exposed, is episode 4. Yes the last episode, but to be fair it is a short game so you reach it fairly quickly.

Also i'm not sure why, but the author loved adding ... to every sentence... ...like they would say something... then.... there was a ... i mean it. Almost every sentence was like that, very annoying to read. There were a few bad translations and a few words misspelled. Something i could forgive if the game wasnt asking for 11$.

The only redeeming factor is honestly Ray and the reverand, their characters were really good. Everyone else were kinda annoying to me, but that's super subjective so i wont dive into it. Like most RPG makers interacting with something will cause dialouge describing the object or talking to another NPC, i alway love that and this game does it fairly well and it really adds to the world building.

Was really looking forward to this game i even streamed it because i love story rich games and thought my viewers would too, but this was just not for me and i would not reccomend buying it. OH and for god sakes, Why is f12 the reset button?? you do realize steam has it as their screenshot button right?? god i wasted another 30minutes getting back to where i left off because of that.

I went into it thinking it would be a cheesy RPG Maker-style game—but in all honestly, I fell in love with it. Some parts were still cheesy, but it was done in such a charming way. The characters are silly, interesting, and likeable in their own way. The story was far more intriguing than first expected, making it almost addicting to play more and see what happened next.

It's not the longest RPG out there, but by far, it was one of the more enjoyable ones I've played in a long time.

Das Spiel ist wirklich Klasse.

Für jeden der eine dramatische Geschichte mit emotionalen Höhen und Tiefen mag und nicht auf die kitschige Sorte von Happy-Ends steht (was nicht heißt, dass es nicht ein Happy-End ist, definiert ja jeder selbst)

Die Idee ist wirklich gut und in der Besetzung mir bisher unbekannt. Das Spiel ist mit sehr viel Herzblut und Liebe zum Detail gemacht und nervt dabei nicht mit sinnlos schweren Rätseln, der Spielfluss stimmt einfach und in den 4 Episoden wird einem wirklich viel geboten für das Geld.

Kauft das Ding, ihr werdet es höchstens dahingehend bereuen, dass es irgendwann leider zu Ende geht ;)

38050127.review:
AoD是一款小品rpg，昨天肝到两点给推完了，总体来讲还蛮喜欢这款游戏的，使用来细细的写一下评测。
[list]
      [*] 剧情 5分
作为AoD的买点，rpg游戏的灵魂，这个游戏的剧情蛮精彩的。首先，很巧妙的反差设定，看起来可爱有帅气的女主，招人喜欢，却实为不净之人。反而作为杀人魔的男主，却是一个纯粹的天使。其次，情节设计也同样巧妙，女主的罪与救赎算是整个故事的线索，前面种种伏笔在女主的罪展示给男主（玩家）的时候得到诠释，将剧情推到高潮。女主杀戮是因为无助与软弱，男主杀戮是因为无知与迷茫，男女主通过相互的誓言完成互相的救赎，因爱生力，逃到外面的世界，可以说这个一个很圆满的结局了（撒了一手好狗粮）。
当然其他人物设定也很有趣，尝试以神角度观察的神父、极致利己的医生（医生真能苟）等等看起来有些“变态”的人物，却又何尝不是反映我们规则社会下的芸芸呢。
当然剧情不易多说，不过真的很精彩。
  [*] 游戏环境 4分
先谈画风，算是比较有个性的画风，不过人物的喜怒哀乐，环境的轻松与压抑都能让人感同身受，我还是比较喜欢的，不过对画风要求高一点的话还是要扣一点分的。
说bgm，bgm可以说很到位了，第四章的bgm也很震撼，让玩家同女主的心理一样，推倒，又重铸，找到方向，看见光明。
  [*]操作体验 3分
说实话这个游戏的操作性有点糟糕，先是繁体不能全屏就很恼人，还有有些机关“隐藏”的太深，本来不是对操作要求很高的游戏，可能要多浪费一些时间，考虑到存档点蛮贴心的，加上感情分，也就给3分吧。
还是希望能好好重置一下，增加一下游戏体验。
还有要吐槽一下价钱。。。36RMB对于这款游戏有点偏高了，18RMB倒是可以接受，10RMB以下就是良心价了，当然steam打折不少，大家可以等一手，要是不在乎这点小钱的土豪，还是推荐大家玩一手。
希望Ray和Zack能一直在一起。

38006060.review:
Маленький шедевр, на который я наткнулась совершенно случайно, — просто благодарю Судьбу за такое «столкновение».
 
Атмосфера представляет собой смесь неизбежности, душевных страдай и глубокого одиночества под слоями холодной стали, бездушного камня и закрытых дверей. В первые минуты такое может сильно угнетать, если бы не колоритные обитатели этого дьявольского места — те самые Ангелы Смерти.  Возникает вопрос: что хорошего в том, что какой-то псих пытается тебя убить? Но не в этом суть. Сами персонажи увлекают с первых минут; каждый обладает своим характером и мировоззрением, заставляющим его переступать через 6-ю заповедь «не убий». И следить за их духовной оболочкой очень интересно. Единственно, что немного расстроило, не у всех персонажей было раскрыто прошлое, от чего психологическая картина осталась неполной.
 
Не буду уж описывать сюжет, так как без спойлеров тут не обойтись. Скажу только, что в конце ты окончательно перестаёшь понимать, что тут происходит, но финал получился очень эмоциональным. И пройдя 3-ий эпизод, ты не сможешь успокоиться и мирно жить в реальности, пока не получишь ответы в финальном эпизоде. Просидев до трёх часов ночи и пропитав горючими слезами весь запас бумажных платочков, я поняла, что поиграла в достойную игру. Слов нет, одни эмоции.

Отсутствие русского языка может оттолкнуть (но, кажется, в интернете можно найти пиратку с русс.яз.), потому что английский тут, на мой взгляд и знания, не простой. Особенно, когда персонажи начинают философствовать, тут уж хватайся за голову и словарик. А сколько оскорбительных и матерных слов и выражений я тут узнала, м-м-м. Кладезь. (Спасибо, Зак). Если на английском терпимо, на русском — кровь из глаз, наверняка. (Зная нашего брата).
 
Музыка — отдельный разговор. Она. Просто. Божественна. Я хочу диск или альбом! Пожалуйста! Shut up and take my money!

Если с английским у Вас всё в порядке, и библейские мотивы Вас не отпугивают — играйте!

37991497.review:
스토리, 플레이 요소, 캐릭터성, 그리고 플레이어가 생각하게 만드는 부분까지,
무엇 하나 다른 알만툴 게임에 비해서 꿀리지 않는다.
필자는 저번에 주인공들에게 치이기도 했었다. 물론 지금도 치여있다.
상당히 스토리가 어디서는 볼 수 없었던, 살아서 나가기 위해 협력하는 것이 아닌, 서로가 죽이고 죽는, 죽음을 매개체로 계약을 맺은 두 남녀가 같이 지하를 탈출하는 이야기이다. 이 부분부터 상당히 신박했다.
각 층의 관리자들도 하나하나 배경이 있고, 그것에 대해 동화되기도 하고, 고양되기도 한다.
악역에도 감정 이입이 된 작품은 손에 꼽힐 것이다.
무슨 말이 하고 싶은 것이냐면, 그냥 여러가지로 명작이라는 것이다.
플레이타임도 적당한 편이고, 가격도 게임성을 따지면 합리적이라고 본다.

그까짓 10000원! 명작에 투자하자! 지르자!

37935077.review:
Satsuriku no Tenshi, [i](İngilizce ismiyle, Angels of Death)[/i] Stardust KRNKRN (Makoto Sanada) tarafından geliştirilmiş, 4 bölümden oluşan bir psikolojik korku oyunu. Kirisame ga furu mori'de aynı kişi/kişiler tarafından geliştirilmiştir.

Oyunun konusuna gelirsek,
Ana karakterimiz Ray, kendini bir binanın bodrum katında hafızasının bir kısmını kaybetmiş şekilde bulur. Odadan çıkıp bir çıkış yolu ararken elinde tırpan ile gezen Zack ile karşılaşır. Daha sonra ikisi birlikte binadan kaçmanın yolunu arıyorlar.

--

Oyun hakkındaki genel düşüncem ise iyi bir rpg maker oyunu ancak korku yönünden biraz yetersiz sayılabilir. Jumpscare gibi bir beklentim yoktu ancak rpg maker korku oyunlarını oynayanlar bilirler ki bu tür oyunlar atmosferle biraz korkuturlar. Bu oyunda o olay çok fazla yok. Ama yine de birkaç tane kovalama sahnesi ile heyecanlandırmayı ve bir bölümde olan sınırlı görüş alanı hafif ürkütmeyi başarıyor. 

Hikaye olarak bayağı güzel bir hikaye sunmayı başarıyor.
Ana karakterlerin ikisi de sevilesi karakterler o yüzden rpg maker ile yapılmış oyunları sevenler için oynaması eğlenceli bir oyun olacağını düşünüyorum. Bu tür oyunlara başlamak isteyenler için de iyi bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim.

Blogumda daha detaylı yazdığım bir inceleme bulunmakta, ilgilenenler okuyabilirler.

37621624.review: 其实我在玩之前也没期待它能比得上IB狂父魔女之家之类的名著，觉得有青鬼、misao之类的有趣程度就可以。但说实话，差距还是大了点。这类小游戏，一般是被期待恐怖+解密类型的。然后我在这两个钟头都没觉得有什么真正烧脑地方，好像就一直在走流程，就更别谈什么恐怖了。就像电锯惊魂这种最多就是血腥，和恐怖是不沾边的，咒怨才是。这个也一样，只体现出了每层楼守护者是如何精神变态。你说狂父也是满屋子变态，但起码那都是后面一步步揭晓的，有铺垫，不会觉得很唐突。这里女主小小年纪就要死要活的，男主也像个神经病一样拿把电锯扮演杀人狂，真心感觉中二的不行。还有楼层守护者，杀来杀去，然后呢？好像也没杀出什么让我感兴趣的内容，反正就是他要杀我，所以我要反杀他，然后搜集物品钥匙再下一层。。。。这种类型，如果解谜或者恐怖要素不强，是很难吸引人的。这让我想起了梦日记，同样一款我没有继续玩下去的游戏，都是因为在走流程，恐怖解密因素甚少，让我失去了耐心。我相信每过一层，我就越能明白他们为什么要相互杀戮，但2个钟头我已经坚持不下去了，太无聊了点。换了电脑后至今未安装，偶然想起来还没测评，总结一句：这不是恐怖解密小游戏。

37550406.review:
这个游戏告诉了我 
玩任何热门的剧情向游戏 最好自己先试水
原先是看过b站某up主的实况（观看到墓地杀人鬼登场）才接触的这款游戏 但直至黑五才购买下来亲自游玩 
我一定要说
“这部游戏太让人明澈内心了。”

[b][u]*以下感想涉及大量剧透，请没玩过的朋友不要查看涂黑的部分[/u][/b]
[spoiler] 在整部游戏里我最爱的角色是zack，并不是我认为他所做的所有事都是正确的，也没有包容他身上所有暴力倾向的特质。但有很多缺点的zack在我看来却拥有最大的，谁都无法掩盖的，能媲美皎月的光芒。可以从他纯粹而坚定自我选择和死守诺言的行为中渗透到每一个ray和他进行沟通的环节。而正是这种能振作给予ray生存下去的实感和意义的不变而坚强的事物出现，才会显得他们之间怪异的誓言尤为珍贵，这是一种精神力量，是一种信仰，他不是神，不是ray的神，不是自己的神，也不会有他的神存在，但一个简单的誓言的存在却让他近乎于神。而唯一的区别在于，非神的、人与人之间的誓言，是心灵的羁绊，不注重最终结果，只注重过程。而穿插于整个故事的线索便是天使，神，人，魔女这类定位的词汇。
在这里我想用从最初的最初开始的时间线的顺序交杂一下我的个人感言。一切都是脑洞，可能与作者本意相违背，如果有想一起猜猜看可以看看。
首先这个建筑应该可以推测是被神父出资建造起来的，因为在游戏的结尾处很清楚的表明了是他希望站在上帝的视角来观察他带来的每个天使、纯粹的杀人鬼们，会产生怎样的结果，在出资问题上，在ray和神父讨论女行刑人的死的时候可以看出，神父很无奈于她的大开销，不难得出身为"幕后黑手"的神父资产是有多么庞大。而深入的展开一下脑洞，神父拥有可以令人产生幻觉的药物……这是不是也证明了神父的背景故事一定很丰富呢？不过神父和医生丹尼应该算是老相识，或许那种药剂是丹尼制造出来的也不一定。
有一个疑点是，神父所在的楼层B2向上前进后就是通往外界的门。而ray的推理中表明，最后的杀人鬼（她本身）所在的B1层无法找到出口的，即使是说明danny医生确实为她特别建造了一层。如果是这样来看，那么B7（无人），一直到B6（zack原本所在楼层），B5（医生所在楼层），B4（掘墓小鬼所在楼层），B3（处刑女所在楼层），B2（神父所在楼层），或许能代表一定的时间顺序。但又让人难以想象神父是如何同处刑女和掘墓小鬼相识并构建了这个大楼的。而更奇怪之处是，他们所在的场所应该是地下，为什么结尾处冒出青烟的是一座耸立在外的大楼？但ray说过电梯只能往上而不能向下，B1层是无法找到出口的，而B2层又有向上通过的楼梯，出来即是外界，那么他们是在地下就更能确定了。可是丹尼医生说B1是在ray来临之后才建立的，为什么B1先留出了呢？
如果不是作者的失误，我猜想B1其实【原本】是丹尼医生的住所。这样根据楼层来判断入住先后顺序似乎就可以讲得通了。医生和神父先凿了B1和B2分别入住，随后是处刑女……掘墓小鬼……然后就是zack(从掘墓小鬼从很早以前就搜集了zack的资料而zack却对小鬼相知甚少推测zack并不太熟悉其他人，而且要后来一会，因为他原本是神父的观察重点对象，即所谓的杀戮天使，纯粹而简单。但ray的存在打破了一切的平衡，致使到最初她从B7出现，医生明明那么在乎她的生死却没有在她身边，很有可能是神父做的手脚。因为即使是记得一切，并且会做出杀戮行为的ray也是会影响到想要观察到天使实验的gray神父所拥有的最精明沉着的信徒丹尼医生，因为丹尼医生一旦和ray的羁绊过深说不定就会从她身上，从满是自己母亲的影子的人身上得到能够替代的爱。自此变得软弱，不再纯粹，堕落成人类。说到底神父所认为的人类即是丑陋肮脏但又同时美丽的，而天使即是单纯的残酷可以归零抹消一切，恶魔则会蛊惑人心并引其堕落。而zack他一开始就是人类，因为他不相信神的存在，他只相信自己的判断，所以他即残酷、纯粹的消抹着他人的存在，又自身就拥有一种强大的魅力。他改变了ray让她相信自己，重新拾回了生命的光芒，而ray同样也是人类，不仅残酷，也唤醒了zack内心深处一直想要听到的言语，
"你不是收养院的人口中的道具，不是父母和丹尼医生亦或是其他人口中的怪物，你也不是我的神，你就是zack，从一开始就是zack。"[/spoiler]

37546768.review:
首先这篇评测的内容不会直接剧透，但是依旧有可能使你对剧情的猜测被导向，请酌情阅读，我不会涂黑，因为它没有一个字是真正需要涂黑的。
这是一个黑暗中寻找光的故事。
两个与神最遥远的人，两个许诺去杀戮的人，
两个需要被需要的人，两个互相去救赎的人。
誓言也许是荒唐的，真相也许是崩坏的，
结局也许是浑浊的。
然扎克有了寄托，然瑞依有了家人。
两人成了两人。
我认为《杀戮天使》的成功主要有两点，一是设计了几个鲜明的人物，一是讲述了一个动人的故事。
音乐与画面的制作达到了“完成”的水平，难么只要有了上面的两个亮点，那么无疑可以称的上是一部优秀的RPG了。
四章的故事内容，节奏上安排的十分妥当，不紧凑，不松散，很好的把作者想要有的感受带给了玩家。
作为一款叙事性的“恐怖逃生游戏”，他的几个BOSS关卡设计的十分精致。这点也很好的烘托出人设的特点。
启承转伏的设置让故事有趣又不令人震惊。没错，我认为杀戮天使较平和的剧情处理的十分恰当，因为这正符合了全作的风格。黑色暴力下的一个温馨的故事，何必要那么大的转折呢，只要你被治愈了不就好了呢。
因为，如果说世界上没有扎克和瑞依的庇护所的话，两个人相拥，也就够了。

36692185.review:
看見推薦此遊戲的評論稱之為神作
沒多做思考就買了
遊戲製作大師作出來的遊戲
無非是靠劇情或遊戲性

====以下有雷====

這遊戲基本上沒有所謂的遊戲性
關卡可說是毫無難度，解謎也非常容易
整體來說我無法從關卡設計與通關過程中找到樂趣

遊戲裡關卡以樓層作區分，每個樓層獲得的物品相當稀少
且每樓地圖十分狹小，很難找不到物品的使用方式
物品用完即消失，並不會帶到下個樓層
使用方式錯誤也不會有懲罰造成角色死亡
這也導致解謎異常容易且沒有壓力
明明劇情塑造成逃離有殺人鬼的未知空間
但大部分的時間卻無法感受到緊湊氣氛
另外遊戲初期會提醒玩家物品要從道具欄裡使用
個人覺得很多於，本來就沒多少使用的地方
卻還要特地打開道具欄使用
而遊戲某些場景是直接調查地圖物件即可選擇是否使用物品
系統設定不一也讓我覺得莫名其妙

樓層B4與B3的守門人我甚至覺得沒有存在的必要與價值
這兩個關卡的過程也許可以增加對兩位主角的認識
但把這兩個守門人隨便設定成其他角色
我認為都不會對遊戲劇情產生影響
這點我真的覺得非常失敗


劇情方面我也不明白到底哪裡可被稱為神作
「幫你逃出去再殺了我」的這個誓言
我感覺就只是為了吸引玩家的噱頭
即使劇情有交代女主角的心境變化
但我完全無法從這誓言產生任何共鳴
劇情的描述讓我覺得一切只是為了慘而慘
沒辦法從女主角的遭遇擠出一絲同情

最後要逃離啟動自爆裝置的大樓
與被醫生開槍偷襲這些劇情
當下我真的玩到出神
這是2000年的遊戲劇情吧?
老套就算了我還沒辦法融入劇情之中
到底醫生為什麼要炸了大樓我完全不明白阿

=========================
網路上搜尋此遊戲多數人冠以「恐怖遊戲」名頭
但我想告訴大家，這絕對稱不上是一款恐怖遊戲
遊戲內容有血腥，但絕不恐怖
出場角色或許詭譎，但絕不恐怖
如果把它當作是恐怖遊戲來玩肯定很失望

看到結局我認為這應該是一部浪漫愛情懸疑故事
或許我就是錯估了遊戲的定位才無法享受此遊戲

最後我唯一認可的是BGM

게임성에서는 공포게임이라기엔 공포감이나 스릴같은 것이 부족하다.
하지만 매층마다 창의적으로 다른 진행과 전개방식을 펼쳐주었고, 또한 그런 방식이 스토리를 전개 하면서 주인공들이 어떻게 변화하는지 다양한 상황속에서 볼 수 있어서 즐거웠다.

하지만 스토리가 대체적으로 중2병이라고 할만한 요소가 꽤 있다. 그렇기에 그런 것에 거부감이 있다면 스토리를 중점으로 진행되는 이 게임에서 지루하거나 꺼려질 수 있으므로 그런 사람들에게는 추천하지 않는다.

한가지 아쉬웠던 점은 시작 때는 생기있는 눈을 하던 레이첼이 대니편 이후로 결말에 잭을 만나기 전까지도 거의 죽은 눈을하고 쭉 말수가 적다는 점인데, 탈출할 때도 감정변화가 그렇게 크지 않았고 그 이후로 다시 카운셀링 받을 때도 혼자 떠안는 다면서 잭을 기다리지않고 원래의 죽은 눈에 무뚝뚝한 레이첼의 모습을 유지했기 때문이다.

36430877.review:
Completed the game not long time ago. I must say...i'm still under impression. That's definitely not a game you play every day. Or every month. Or every year. Last time i was so impressed was Corpse Party: Blood Covered.
  From technical side, the game has been created on rpgmaker or something very simple, with children-like drawing. It feels like a game of one man in a hurry. You won't see anything stunning from this point.
  What makes this game precious - storyline. And emotions it creates. It's not about cheap spooky jumpscares (Mad Father) or a lot of wrong decisions you can do (Corpse Party). With tension, the more you closer to the end/truth, the more emotions it evokes. Also, it's not hasty in showing a lot of things to us. For the indie game on rpg maker - it's even more than some AA does. I won't spoil anything, it must be played through. What do i mean about "a lot of things"? - things i figured out for myself, like searching for own self, creating unordinary bonds, decisions, showing the difference in point of views, some of which are desires for something simple and ordinary like happy family. 
  Most of the characters are also a killers. The game doesn't justify anyone or anything, it just shows that they are not that one-layered (except some filler guys, i must accept that). 
  At last, how to react at the events, decisions, critisize them is personal as always. As i said before, i was greatly impressed by the story, that's my exuse for a bit long yet messy review.

36339629.review:
作为一名国人RPG玩家，很荣幸通过岚少了解了这款游戏。感谢岚少，感谢星屑大大。
刚开始看到游戏标题的时候，有些不解，何为“杀戮天使”？又是怎样的人才能被称之为“杀戮天使”？
以蕾切尔的视角，这些问题逐渐得到解答，又逐渐产生了更深一层的问题。操控着这个大楼的人究竟是什么样的存在？
谜团愈来愈深厚，玩的兴致自然愈加浓厚，即使看过岚少实况，我还是满怀兴致的自己打通了游戏。老实讲，确实没有什么对手残党不友好的设定。（其实魔女之家真结局通过过后应该可以应付许多追逐战了。
游戏里展现的内容始终是有限的，譬如各个角色更前面些的背景故事游戏里提及甚少，喜欢游戏的可以去漫画里补补，当然，好消息是动画化宣布，小说也出了一卷。
在这种背景设定下，你无法说某个角色的做法是错误的，因为，他们有着各自的理由。
玩到最后，才明白其实这座楼的每一个人都是“杀戮天使”。
也正因为如此，他们才会被神父带到这里。
蕾切尔黑化的那一刻，BGM简直是神配合！
关系就是杀与被杀啦！就这样也能塞你一口狗粮！就问你服不服！
结局可以说让人自由遐想，二人离开后究竟发生了什么事情，每个人都有不同的想法，所以留白是最好的选择。
最后再次感谢星屑大大带来这样的好作品~蕾切尔和扎克你们快去结婚啦~！

36238189.review:
Never ever before in my life had I thought I'd come to love a character so much that I genuinely, wholeheartedly wish for their death.

The motives that drove the main characters through the entire plotline was something I'd never seen before in any other media, so it really intrigued me. A protagonist that wanted to die?? It was something totally different and out of left field, and I loved it.

What really drove me to continue playing this game despite the uneasy atmosphere and terrifying chase scenes were the characters. Needless to say, the characters were EASILY the best part about this game. The interactions between Ray and Zack were masterfully written and very entertaining, and had no problem tugging at the heartstrings. [spoiler] Not to mention Zack's character arc throughout Episodes 2, 3 and 4 was exceptional, especially when he was so adamant on fulfilling Ray's wish to die by his hands and refusing anything or anyone else to harm her. [/spoiler]

In fact, I was rooting for [spoiler] Ray's death [/spoiler] so hard that when [spoiler] the ending came and Zack's execution was announced I actually started to panic, afraid that all their hard work would be all for naught. Luckily, that wasn't the case. [/spoiler]

All in all, this game is fantastic for those in the mood for puzzles, wonderfully wacky dialogue and a boatload of heartache and psychological trauma (not necessarily directed at you).

이 게임은 그저 오글거리는 중2병 코미디 퍼즐 게임이 될 것 입니다.
하지만 당신이 게임의 스토리에 진정으로 몰입할 수 있는 사람이라면
이 게임은 진정한 갓겜으로 승천할 것입니다.

단점
게임에 몰입하지 못한다면 오글거리는 스토리 (사실 단점이라고 하기에는 조금 애매하다)
그 외에 특별한 단점은 없다.

장점
괜찮은 OST, 괜찮은 일러스트, 괜찮은 도트 전반적인 게임성은 준수합니다.
퍼즐 난이도도 머리를 써야하지만 너무 어렵지 않은 적당한 정도로
"흥미롭고 매력적이다" 라고 말하기에 부족함이 없습니다.

35619134.review:
遲了很久才接觸到的神作！
本來只是想看一下內容如何而已，結果一玩就停不下來
劇情不僅令人動容，也讓人反思後天環境造成的犯罪問題

這棟大樓內的每個殺人鬼都有故事，雖然都只是些在社會上很常見的經歷，可是事後回想起來，我們這種生活在和諧家庭下的人，又怎麼理解那樣沉重的傷痛?
我想作者想藉著他們的過去，告訴玩家他們的異於常人並非天性如此，而是外在充滿惡意的環境壓迫著他們當時幼小的心靈，扭曲了他們的靈魂
於是「殺戮」成了在巨大痛苦中尋求生命的手段，然而不被社會常規接受的方式又將他們導向更大的孤獨，令人不勝唏噓

ps:目前已經有延伸出漫畫和小說了，但是還是推薦先在什麼都不知道的情況下玩過一輪遊戲

35194057.review:
Angels of Death is a relatively simple game without any real new concept. The mechanics serve like that of any other horror RPG: picking up stuff, putting down stuff, and running away from anything that can move. Despite any sense of originality within the gamplay, the plot makes up for most of it. The story, while sometimes hard to follow, is quite interesting to say the least. The atmosphere which the player interacts with, while not at it's full potential, couples with the game pretty well. There aren't any small, worthless things to inspect. In fact, all you do inspect ends up being relevant to advance the game at some point or are just empty boxes. Angels of Death isn't very long, either. The game only lasts about 5-6 hours. 

Overall, the greatest, and some may say, only, selling point of this game is the strange but unique storyline. However, it is still a game worth playing simply to enjoy a new story. 

Oh, not to mention, I absolutely love the character designs.

34994232.review:
살인귀와 소녀의 유대감을 담은 스토리입니다.

사나다 선생님이 연극 쪽 공부를 했던가 연극 쪽 일을 했던가 하시는데,
그래서인지 연극과 흡사한 연출이 꽤 많습니다.
까만 무대에서 주인공들에게만 조명이 비춰진다던가 하는 거요.
저는 이런 연출 덕분에 더 몰입이 잘 되어서 무척 좋았습니다.

여기 나오는 캐릭터들이 다 조금씩 엇나가서 미쳐가지고,
도덕적으로 옳지 못한 주인공에 이입하지 못하시는 분들은 좀 거부감이 드실 것 같습니다.
하지만 이렇게 엇나간 캐릭터들이 각자 매력을 가지고 있어서,
투디니까 좀 엇나가도 괜찮다 하는 분들께는 무척 재미있게 다가올 것 같네요.

총 4챕터로 나눠져 있는데, 플레이 시간은 한 챕터당 1시간 30분 정도 됩니다.
네 개 다 합하면 6시간 정도네요.
제 플레이 시간이 11시간인 건 두 번 플레이를 해서 그렇습니다.

게임 난이도는 쉬운 편입니다.
제가 컨트롤을 엄청 못하는 편인데도 어떻게 다른 사람 도움 없이 잘 끝마쳤으니까요.
일단 잭이... 생각보다 굉장히 빠르기 때문에... 잭만 조심하시면 문제없을 것 같습니다.
난이도는 사나다 선생님이 일부러 너무 어렵지 않게 했다고 들었어요.
특히 처음 추격전은 '왜 이렇게 빠른 거야'라는 무력감을 느끼면서도
두세 번 정도 반복하면 깰 수 있도록 했다는 인터뷰를 얼핏 본 기억이 납니다.

챕터가 나눠져 있다는 곳에서 눈치채셨을 것 같은데,
이 게임은 선택지에 따른 엔딩 분기점은 없습니다.
엔딩이 하나라서, 쭉 이야기를 따라가면 자연스럽게 엔딩을 보게 되어있어요.
그래서 게임을 어려워하는 분들이나 애니보듯 쭉 따라가고 싶은 분들께는 적격이지만,
이것저것 눌러본다던지 업적 깨듯 게임을 세세히 하시는 분들은 조금 지루하실지도 모르겠네요.

막 엄청난 반전과 공포! 같은걸 기대하시는 분들께는 좀... 추천하기 힘들지만
캐릭터 자체와 그들간의 관계성 같은걸 더 중시하시는 분들이라면 꼭 추천드리고 싶습니다.
게임 플레이 해보시고, 만화책(정발본)도 있으니 맘에 드셨다면 그 쪽도 읽어보셨으면 해요.

游戏难度适中，剧情非常出彩。别看表面上标了个“恐怖”的标签，其实玩下来一点也不恐怖，反而很催泪。
游戏讲述了Ray和Zack在大楼里逃亡的过程中，Ray逐渐意识到了[spoiler]自己的真实姿态[/spoiler]，最终[spoiler]为了期望被Zack杀死而与他私奔[/spoiler]的故事。Ray的[spoiler]家暴经历[/spoiler]，Zack的[spoiler]孤儿院经历[/spoiler]，Zack[spoiler]用镰刀[/spoiler]迫使Ray[spoiler]意识自我[/spoiler]的片段，以及最后[spoiler]双方为了誓言而互相勉励活下去[/spoiler]的场景，真的是十分感人。哭不出来，但心如刀绞。不仅如此，神父Gray和医生Dannel的表现也使人想恨也恨不起来。最后提一提，在我看来，标题“杀戮的天使”指的就是[spoiler]结识Ray之前的Zack[/spoiler]，也[spoiler]正是Ray将“人性”归还给了Zack[/spoiler]。

34609354.review:
The game is fun, if not a little short. I really enjoyed the story. The gameplay can be a little strange when trying to run and turn, but otherwise it was fairly easy and simple. The characters are very loveable and each unique, if not all crazy of course. It would be neat to see a second game or something added on [spoiler] especially because I want to know what happens with Ray and Zach. Does he kill her after taking her, or do they end up living together or something? Like I need to know and need closure on that [/spoiler]. 

I suggest getting the game if you have the money to enjoy the story for yourself. Each episode was only a few hours long. The puzzles aren't too difficult, though I ended up having a little bit of trouble on one of them because I went dumb.  You have plenty of time for most of the puzzles and you save right before anything too crazy happens. The soundtrack is enjoyable as well and seems to fit well at most parts. I find myself listening to it every now and then. The soundtrack can be found in the games files too, which is nice.

For some reason I couldn't take screenshots during gameplay, so that was a little disappointing for me. Also when you download the game, your antivirus may want to delete some files, stating that the files are dangerous and it's trojan. Just make sure to exclude the game before downloading or if you've already downloaded the game, turn your antivirus off, then verify the games files. When your antivurs turns back on, allow the files it will want to delete when it asks for your input.

That's all I've got to say. Get the game. Play it and enjoy it. Also there is a manga under the name Angel of Slaughter (Satsurika no Tenshi), it's not Officially translated in English, and an anime adaption is in the works. So once playing the game you can get excited for that. Anyways I hope to see a second game or a finale conclusion to the story (as I stated earlier) because to me it still needs a little something extra there at the end.

34473931.review:
很早就玩过这款RPG游戏了，然后到它登录Steam，依然很果决地买了下来，推了第四周目。
应该总体来说，这是一款不可多得的好游戏，相对于前作《雾雨之森》，内容表现的更加充实，人物也更加受欢迎。作者依然很良心【指的是即时存档提示高能、没有闪图之类的】所以即使是害怕恐怖游戏的也能放心玩这款微恐怖的游戏。
接下来讲一讲颇受议论的剧情。剧情中的对话饱受争议，很多人因为对话过于繁琐给这个游戏差评；但是作为一个四周目的玩家，想说的只是，这个剧情这个对话，不受喜欢的话，只可能是玩家没有理解对话，或者无法体会其中的信仰。
——因为，这款游戏，讲述的是一个关于“人”，和“渴望救赎”的故事。
这也是我到了二周目梳理完对话逻辑、到了三周目才完全理解的内容。这回答了我一周目时对这款游戏心情复杂的喜爱的原因。而且到了四周目，我依然觉得，ray和zack能获得“救赎”真的太好了。
买了漫画小说抱枕徽章挂坠公式书，依然还是很想买这款游戏，希望每个玩家都能在这款游戏里吃饱自己能接受的狗粮后，找到关乎自己“救赎”的含义。
当然，要说缺点，唯一一个就是，推多周目时，操作相对过于繁琐。所以只为了回忆吃糖的话，从EP3EP4重玩就差不多了。
最后讲一讲结局，看似结局有BE【Ray自杀】，实际上官方公式书上表示BE党真的是想得太多——官方表示最后ray确实和zack走了，没有让玩家多想的意思。所以开放结局是不存在的，还是安心吃糖吧！
最后依然力推我zack小天使！和ray一辈子！！【比心心】

33984650.review:
This game was fun! It took me about 11 hours total to beat, but I was distracted through bits of it. Here's some points.

- I generally like RPGmaker games, such as Ib, OFF, and Yume Nikki, etc. I had fun playing this game, although the 'gameplay' of it felt more like a visual novel than an actual game. There are some chase sequences, and some puzzles, but it's rarely more intense than that. I would probably have felt alright paying $10 to play OFF or Ib. I don't really feel like the amount of content in this game matches up to a $10 price tag. Maybe if it's on sale for less than 5, give it a shot!
- A big draw to this game is the characters and dialogue. I don't think the story was groundbreaking, but I found myself liking the main character quite a bit.
- The sound effects, and the translation, were a bit, uh.. immersion-breaking, I guess? Distracting. For example, there's a character who every time she appears she has a high-pitched laugh track play-- and it gets overused very quickly. Another character says the word 'peepers' nearly every sentence he speaks, and it can make scenes he appears in lose whatever 'serious' tone they had.

I don't want to be that guy who says "Maybe you should just watch an LP", because I did like this game, but if you're interested in getting it, I would suggest waiting until it goes on sale rather than pay the full $9.99. There's not much reason to replay it and it plays like a lot of other RPGmaker games out there, which is more of a story being told through a game engine than a gameplay-focused game itself.

33474499.review:
-게임의 성격
:사이코 호러 어드벤처 게임이라고 소개되어있지만 호러 요소는 매우 적습니다. 어두운 분위기이며 유혈 요소가 많으나 점프스케어나 혐오스러운(공포스러운) 이미지는 일절 없습니다. 사이코 어드벤처 게임이라고 하는 게 맞을 것 같습니다.
:취향을 타는 요소가 많습니다. 신, 천사, 제물, 죽음, 죄, 참회, 맹세, 인간. 이러한 키워드가 작품의 주축을 이루고 있습니다.
:과격한 표현(유혈, 폭력 묘사) 이 있으므로 민감한 분들에게는 추천드리지 않습니다.

-게임성
:보시다시피 쯔꾸르 게임입니다. 딱 그 틀 안에 있기 때문에 게임성 면에서는 특기할 점이 없습니다.
:스토리에 중점을 둔 일방향 진행이며, 매우 쉽습니다. 중요 구간에 들어갈 때에는 세이브 창을 띄워주는 등 시스템도 친절합니다.
:지나치게 친절해서 아쉽습니다. 힌트를 더 주지 않아도 될 부분에서 굳이 설명을 반복한다든가... 일방향적이라는 느낌을 강하게 준 요인 중 하나였습니다. 몰입할 수 있게 해주는 요소로서 보면 괜찮았네요.

-스토리 진행
:취향이 맞다면 재미있게 즐길 수 있습니다. 등장인물들은 개성이 뚜렷하면서도 따로 놀지 않고, 꽤 충실하게 동일한 키워드로 묶여있습니다. 플롯도 흥미롭습니다. (한글화가 좀 아쉬운 게 오타가 종종 있더군요ㅠㅠ)
:유치한 부분이 군데군데 존재합니다. 지나친 친절함이 원인입니다. 특정 인물이 취하는 행동이나 상황, 사물을 '보여'주는 대신 부자연스러운 대사로 '설명'한다든가(속된 말로 설명충 마냥). 키워드를 다루는 역량의 문제라고 느껴지는 부분도 있고요.
:스토리가 중간에 새지 않고 일관적으로 흐릅니다. 그러면서도 진행이 늘어지지 않게 여러 이벤트를 잘 넣었습니다.
:연출이 좋습니다. 효과음과 이펙트, 배경음 등을 적절하게 넣었고, 인물의 표정도 다양합니다.

SNS를 통해 알게 된 게임인데, 스팀에 들어와 기쁘게 생각합니다. 취향이 맞다면 한 번쯤 해봐도 나쁘지 않은 게임입니다.

33300260.review:
Este es un juego rpg maker el cual trata de Rachel una niña de 13 años, despiertas en un lugar desconocido y lo unico que quieres es salir de alli, asi teniendo que atravesar los diferentes pisos. En cada uno reside un asesino el cual intenta atraparte y matarte. El primero que conoces es Zack un asesino el cual intenta acabar contigo, pero mediante la trama avanza terminas armando equipo con el, por las distintas razones de cada uno, convirtiendose asi en el antagonista. La razon de Rachel es el que el acabe con su vida y la razon de Zack es que ella le ayude a salir de aquel misterioso lugar. 

A mi me gusto dado que su historia puede comenzar de alguna manera "cliche" pero mediante vas avanzando la atmosfera y la historia te atrapan e incluso te llegas a encariñar de personajes. Los controles de este son bastante sencillos y casi cualquier computadora lo puede correr (creo yo). El final no decepciona, o a mi no me decepciono. Yo recomiendo ovo (?)

33042944.review:
I've always been a fan of the Horror RPG Adventure genre, so once I've started playing Angels of Death, it just clicked in naturally for me (I should also note that; I've NEVER completely finished a true Horror RPG Adventure title before, so it was the first time for me with Angels of Death!) However it is not a perfect nor a complete game, it certainly has some downfalls, with Gameplay Aspects, Dialogue Pacing, a few Textbox Errors (which was a huge pain) and the unfortunate Translation mishap.
 
 
What makes Angels of Death stick out the most from the genre was; their Characters, Worldbuilding, Theme & Storytelling! I’d find myself feeling invested in the story, wanting to learn more about the characters and backstory (which is currently possible, though the lack of any English Official Translation of the Angels of Death Manga series) 
 
The worldbuilding may seem lacking, but would come through very subtly and unappreciated! (something that I admire a lot!) And as for the character development… it just leaves me very speechless; I could only assume it would be a, “You either Love them or Hate them” scenario, but in MOST cases it would be the former.
 
What I do praise the game the MOST was for the Character Designs! They are all equally memorable for the low numbers of casts (in their respected themes) making them very unique and complementary to each other!
 
The Soundtrack however was not very well balanced throughout the entire game; so it was rare for me to find a track I REALLY enjoyed, or find it to be awfully unfitting (for the appropriate theme or timing)
 
As I mentioned before, the Dialogue Pacing in the game wasn’t Angels of Death strong suit; but I would give credit for the game’s attempt of changing the gameplay pacing and theme in each Episode! For me, I very much appreciate the game for keeping me on my toes, during each Credits sequence!!
 
 
MY FINAL OVERVIEW IS; I would ‘Love’ to replay Angels of Death in due time, once it receives an Improved and Finalised Update on the Translations, that would do justice on Angels of Death!
Till then, I still find myself feeling very disappointed on the misuse of rephrasing, it’s a shame that 星屑KRNKRN’s games (especially a PAID game) would have to receive this kind of treatment on their work.
 
But for anyone looking to try out the game, I encourage you to give Angels of Deaths a shot! It’s definitely a game you shouldn’t miss, especially from the Horror RPG Adventure Library.
I guarantee that you would find ‘some kind of “weird” enjoyment’ from the game, for its unique charms!

I liked it xD! It's kind of creepy in its own originality but still i absolutely I would recommend it~ it is a good game~

32984614.review:
I want to start this review off by saying I am not bored by RPG Maker style games that focus on story with minimal gameplay and I adore story rich games in general. However my entire experience with Angels of Death felt half-baked in that every gameplay element it tries to pull off feels unfinished and not well thought out.

The "puzzles" are flawed in that I never once had to stop and think about what I was doing. The answers were either incredibly obvious or it was a matter of "use everything in my inventory on this one thing," which would take about 15 seconds and then the puzzle would practically solve itself, lacking the "AHA!" moment which makes puzzles fun in the first place.

The other piece of gameplay is very occasionally evading killers, which actually sounds like a fun concept until you realise that this just means running along a path and hoping you don't take a wrong turn. Don't worry if you do though, you just have to wait a few seconds to load and then try again with absolutely no consequence for your failure because the game autosaves right before any part where you could potentially get a game over. This completely kills any tension that could have been established with these scenes.

The last thing that could be considered gameplay is walking around the world exploring and interacting with things, and they somehow fucked this up the most. A game is meant to make you feel that you as a player occupy a space in a virtual world which functions even when you're not playing it. However this game feels manufactured in a cookie-cutter way in that everything you have the option to interact with is only there to advance the story. There are no interesting little things you can find hidden away that offer world building or more information about the characters. It lacks the hand-crafted charm that is often the reason I play small indie titles like this one.

The main problem with Angels of Death is that it has no reason to be a video game. Completely failing in all it's gameplay elements, all that's left to this title is a dialouge only story that most people have much lower standards of writing for because it's "just a video game."

TLDR: Angels of Death attempts to tell a story which can be told much better and more completely using any other medium of storytelling. It's almost as if the developers wanted to make a visual novel, but couldn't afford artists so instead they downloaded rpg maker.

32945961.review:
[h1]덕질에 최적화된, 오로지 덕후를 위한 게임[/h1]
살육의 천사, 이름을 한번쯤 들어보신 분이 많으실거라 생각합니다. 나름대로 인지도 있는 알만툴 기반 일본의 동인 게임중 하나고, 2차 창작과 미디어믹스가 제법 활발합니다. 본격적인 리뷰에 앞서 이 게임은 스팀 친구의 적극적인 영업을 통해 선물을 받아서 플레이하게 되었음을 밝힙니다.

[h1]장점[/h1]
[list]
    [*] 적당한 게임성과 스토리의 비중: 스토리를 게임성보다 더 큰 비중을 두게 만든 게임은 딜레마를 가지고 있는 경우가 있습니다. 스토리에 치중하면 게임성이 너무 없어지게 됩니다. 둘 다 잡기 위해 게임성을 조금 신경쓰다 보면 스토리에 집중을 하지 못하거나, 난잡하단 느낌이 들게 됩니다. 그런 면에서 이 게임의 밸런스는 비교적 적당합니다. 적당히 어렵지 않으면서도 흥미를 잃지는 않게 해주는 퍼즐과, 적당히 몰입하게 만드는 스토리의 연출력은 어느정도 균형이 잡혀 있습니다.
    [*]괜찮은 연출력: 대사창에서 뜨는 세세한 캐릭터들의 표정 변화와 BGM의 수준, 이벤트시의 연출력 등은 나쁘지 않습니다. 게임 내의 소소한 유머요소도 나름의 즐길거리.
    [*] 세계관과 캐릭터성: 거의 모든 캐릭터가 뭔가 있다는 인상을 심어주고, 입체적이고 매력적인면 역시 있습니다. 세계관도 플레이어들에게 흥미를 유발하긴 충분합니다.
    [*]소소한 편리성: 이벤트 직전에 자동 저장을 해주는 기능 등 플레이어에게 편의성을 주는 기능이 있습니다. 어디까지나 소소한 장점입니다만, 편리하죠.
    [*]풍부한 미디어믹스: 애니메이션, 코믹스, 4컷만화 등 게임을 즐기고 나서 비하인드 설정을 푸는 미디어믹스가 있어 게임의 뒷설정에 흥미가 있는 사람들에겐 장점일거라 생각합니다.
[/list]

[h1]단점[/h1]
[list]
    [*] 뻔한 스토리: 반전은 없습니다. 무엇을 상상하건 그 이상도, 이하도 보여주지 않습니다. 이것이 정석을 따른다는 느낌을 주거나, 기대한 그것을 보여준단 느낌으로  긍정적으로 받아들일 수도 있겠습니다.
    [*] 호불호가 갈릴 진행과 스토리: 일본 문화계에서 흔히 볼 수 있는 진행입니다. 은유적이고 돌려말하는 대사들이 많으며, 오글거리다 느낄 전개 역시 다수 존재합니다. 몇몇 캐릭터들은 B2 이후로 연설 수준으로 말을 길게 쏟아내고, 이는 사람에 따라 지루함을 유발할 수도 있습니다.
    [*] 아쉬운 호러 전개: 나름대로 음침한 분위기는 잘 자아냅니다만 이는 초반에 그칩니다. 호러적인 면에서는 페이스 조절 실패라고 평가하겠습니다.
[/list]
종합적으로, 이 게임은 [덕질용 게임]으로서는 최적화되어 있습니다. 게임의 시놉시스와 스토리도, 캐릭터성도, 스토리텔링도, 미디어믹스도 일본 라이트노벨과 애니메이션을 연상케 합니다. 그렇기에 이런 문화를 많이 접해보신 분들이라면, 이 게임은 그닥 후회하지 않을 선택이 될 것입니다. 그러나 당신이 그러한 사람이 아니라면 이 게임보다는 다른 스토리 위주 진행 게임이 더 나을수도 있을겁니다. 일단 저는 그놈의 연설을 제외하고는 이 게임을 재밌게 하였고 추천 버튼을 누르겠습니다. 그러나 이 게임이 "대중성"을 확보할만한 게임이냐에 대해서는 살짝 의문을 던집니다.

+ 에피소드 3에서 RGSS3 오류가 뜨신 분은 SeeVideo SF가 설치되어 있는지 확인해보시기 바랍니다. 해당 프로그램과 이 게임은 충돌이 발생합니다. 만능 해결법은 아니지만..

本游戏分为四个章节， 第一章节铺垫 第二章节逐渐开始高潮部分，第三章节也是秘密浮现出水面的故事 第四章节为整个故事的讲述 高潮 结局
第一章节玩的时候有可能会感觉到无聊...BGM单调 全是五毛效果，而当你这么认为的时候故事开始让你感到越来越的有趣导致想要知道更多后面的结局，

Эта игра не имеет ни выдающихся артов, ни запоминающихся звуковых эффектов.

Лично я считаю, что эта игра стоила своих денег. Она подарила мне море эмоций.

Сюжет: Захватывающий
Персонажи: Яркие и запоминающиеся
Музыкальное сопровождение поддерживает атмосферу игры

Итог: Очень советую данную игру любому любителю инди игр. Также это отличный вариант для ознакомления с жанром rpg maker.

31964856.review:
TL;DR: If you like RPG maker games you´ll probably like this one.

Nice little RPG maker game, its divided into 4 chapters, each during about an hour and a half so its on the short side, as far a gameplay goes it can be compared to most horror RPG maker games given its basic puzzles and survival bits, but it uses those more as storytelling tools than actual horror. The characters are interesting and the music is good enough, if you are a sucker for bitersweet stories or for interesting killer designs then this is is pretty good.

HOWEVER

This is far from the best game of its kind that I´ve played and far from some of the best videogames stories I´ve played, I think you could enjoy the story a lot more if it were given in a comic (webcomic, manga, whathever floats your boat) or something similar, a manga exists, it seems this game was a hit in japan so if you like the aesthetic/characters/concept I recommend you read that instead since the few gameplay bits are not enjoyable by themselves.

I think there are 2 types of people who would enjoy this game 

1- People who LOVE rpg maker games like Mad Father or IB.
2- People who never played an rpg maker game before.

If you are either of those I truly recommend it, if not then aproach without high expectations

31819026.review:
First of all a question to whichever genius wrote this story.

HOW?! 

How do you create something that is both ****ed up and ****ing beautiful at the same time? 

I do not want to spoil the story because it is best experienced blind, in fact I'm very glad I got around to playing it rather than watching a let's play as this is one of the best game narratives I've experienced in a while. The main crux of it really focuses on the growing bond between Ray, a teenage girl who wants to die, and Zack, a ruthless serial killer, as they leave the building together with the promise that Zack will kill Ray once they've escaped. From there we go to each of the floors, which have their own unique killer to run from and puzzles to solve. I loved encountering each new threat, every character was extremely memorable and each one presented a different type of challenge to overcome. But it really is the relationship of Ray and Zack that pushes a lot of the emotional scenes, in fact it's quite unreal how much my heart aches at some of these scenes (I should not want to hug a killer as much as I do playing this).

The graphics are also really impressive, there is so much personality not only in each character's designs but the way they move when they're on screen, and they match up with the expressions on the character portraits brilliantly. While the levels aren't huge they do match the theme of each killer, and the puzzles don't get repetitive. The mechanics are quite basic but it works, the one issue I do have is how difficult it is to be precise while running; I died several times because I was running away from something  and I couldn't quite line up the character with the door I needed to go through (but that could just be me). I would love to get hold of the soundtrack as there are some amazing songs throughout, particularly Zack's chase theme. 

The funny thing is that I recently made a list of my favourite games but I feel I need to rearrange it to include Angels of Death, this is easily my favourite RPGMaker game. Overall it's a fantastic game that I highly recommend, I loved playing it and I'm sure another playthrough isn't far away in my future.

On a final note, I really think Doctor Danny needs his own rendition of the Jeepers Creepers song; that's literally what came into my head every time he said 'peepers'.

HOW I WISH THIS GAME WAS MORE FAMOUS LIKE IT IS IN JAPAN

Seriously guys, this is a must. At least for me.

I've been playing rpg horror games for a while now and this is one of my favorites. The horror doesn't come in jumpscares, but more in the story and surroundings, the characters and all that. The game is not hard to beat, doesn't have different routes and whatever you do (unless you get killed. That's a gameover) you'll get the same ending. The protagonist can get a little tiresome to deal with but her companion makes it totally worth it.

Also, it has God as one of the main themes, but before you go and ditch it please, give it a try. It does get tiring at some point, but like I said, the co-protagonist is worth all of that.

The game isn't so much about fighting villains, but to show how these two get to appreciate each other and see things in different perspective, though it isn't 100% morally correct tbh, but they're trying :)

All in all, it's not perfect, but it's worth it.

31458744.review:
Chu~

This game impressed me so much that I cannot but write a review about it. This was an unforgettable experience as far as the story itself is concerned. The characters…well, it is a difficult topic while all of them are extraordinary in many aspects. 

So, let’s start with the most interesting part: the plot. I should warn you that there will be some spoilers in my review, but I will do my best to hide them and not to ruin the plot twist for you (oh, and there is one, trust me!). Please, do not read the hidden parts unless you have already played the game!

The story tells us about a girl, Rachel Gardner, who finds herself in an unfamiliar place all alone. She is surprised and wants to see her parents as soon as possible but has no idea what to do and what happened. She sees an elevator and tries to open it. However, all of a sudden, there comes an announcement: “This girl is a sacrifice. The game starts”. Quite intriguing, is not it? 

And here comes the first floor, the first trap. Speaking about the gameplay, the game is not difficult at all. You can die, of course, but I do not think that it will happen too often. The main idea of the game is to show you a story, not to make you suffer from unsolvable puzzles or meet your end while fighting with endless enemies. 

The characters. We have a very interesting cast here. First of all, I would like to talk about Zack. My first impression of him was negative - [spoiler] he was trying to kill Rachel and was quite a madman. To be honest, he scared me to death with his sudden appearances and crazy laughter! [/spoiler]. However, starting from the second episode, my opinion on him began to change. On the one hand, he is as crazy as a Mad Hatter [spoiler]well, the main difference is that he also kills people[/spoiler], but, on the other hand, he has a surprisingly innocent soul. Sounds strange, I know, but his childish outlook on everything and everybody made me like him more and more with every episode. [spoiler] Most of all, I was shocked by the story of his childhood. He lived in an awful place where he even had to bury bodies of other children! He was no more than a piece of meat for adults there. No child, no matter how strange he or she is, should be treated like this! [/spoiler] I was rutting for him to survive through the whole story.

Secondly, there is Rachel herself. You might be surprised why I did not mention her first, after all, she is the main character. The only thing I can say is that you need to play the game to understand the tragedy of this little creature. [spoiler] Her life was as horrific as Zack’s one. Parents who always argue and have no interest for their own child, who beat each other and her, who deserved to die. And they died. They were killed by the hand of their own daughter. She just wanted to have her “own” perfect family and did not know any other way to achieve this goal.[/spoiler] This is the most contradictive person in the whole story. I still do not know what I feel about her. Is it sadness? Or anger? Or disgust? Or sympathy? She deserves all of them.

In the end, I cannot but mention other characters, the executors, the Angels of Death. Each of them is a complete person with their own bugs in the head. Each one has their own views of sins and virtues. And again I cannot say whether they are evil or good. They believe in their theories to such extent that they have become their very core. Still, the only person I really disliked is Cathy. This one is a cruel *insert a word here*, whom I despise not only for her beliefs but also for her terrible laughter. It was driving me crazy the whole second episode, for God’s sake!

So, after talking about the characters for so long, I am finally coming to the main idea of my review. The ending was both surprising and predictable in some ways. However, I was mostly impressed by what kind of impact it left on me. [spoiler] I was happy for two crazy killers! I was so glad that they survived and made their way out of this hell. And the ending itself is the best way to put the final point of this story. There is nothing to add, nothing to remove.[/spoiler] 

My verdict is: play Angels of Death! No matter whether you like this type of games or not! This is one of the best stories I have ever read and the characters made me feel the whole spectrum of emotions, from fear to happiness, from love to hate. You need to try this title to understand what I am talking about. It is rather difficult to find the right words to describe all that I have seen there, and I do not think I should even try to do it. Angels of Death is worth your time and money, and this game will make you think and not just mindlessly click through the story.

P.S. The final note: the music in the closing credits is amazing! Wish I could get it for my music collection. Also, the art of this game is not something that everybody will like. Personally, I found it as an integral part of the story and would not like to see any other artstyle there.

And I should say that Angels of Death is worth replaying after some time, just to return to this amazing world.

31423298.review:
Ich war absolut begeistert von diesem Spiel. Mich hat die Story sehr gefesselt und ich konnte nicht mehr aufhören bis ich alle 4 Chapter durchgespielt hatte.

Die Beziehung zwischen den einzelnen Charakteren wird über das gesamte Spiel vertieft, wobei man selber anfängt mit den Charakteren zu fühlen und bei einzelnen Interaktionen oder Konversatzionen einem schon mal der Atem aus bleibt.

Das Gameplay ist recht simpel aber dafür auch sehr abwechslungsreich. Es ist nicht zu schwierig so das der Hauptaspekt auf der Story liegt und man verschiedene Abschnitte nicht erst 15 mal wiederholen muss bis man weiter machen kann. Auch das Speichersystem ist sehr angenehm, da man jederzeit speichern kann und sollte man zu einer Stelle im Spiel kommen, bei der es schwieriger werden könnte, wird man sogar darauf hingewiesen, dass man jetzt speichern sollte.

Auch die Musik war passend und hat die Stimmung zu den Handlungen jederzeit perfekt unterstützt.

Wirklich störende oder negative  Elemente sind mir während meiner Spielerfahrung nicht aufgefallen.

Das Spiel war seinen Preis definitiv Wert, ich hab es absolut nicht bereut es mir gekauft zu haben und ich kann es nur jedem empfehlen der wert auf eine gute Handlung und sehr gut gestaltete Charakter legt, bei denen man eine durchgängige Entwicklung genießen kann.

전 세일할 때 구매를 했으며, 진 엔딩까지의 플레이 타임은 길게 잡아 6시간입니다.
아무 배경지식 없는 상태에서도 진 엔딩을 볼 정도로 게임이 어렵진 않습니다.
저는 호러 게임을 굉장히 못하는 편이라 걱정하고 플레이했는데, 가끔 비명이 나와 깜짝 놀라게 되는 부분만 뺀다면 어느 정도 다 참고 플레이할 수 있었습니다.
스토리, 브금도 나쁘지 않았고 가끔씩 들려오는 비명소리 효과음이 굉장히 거슬렸다는 것만 뺀다면 기대 수치만큼 값을 해준 게임입니다.
그러나 다 회차 플레이의 필요성이 느껴지진 않았습니다.
결론은 '세일할 때 구매한다면 후회하지 않을 게임'입니다.

30489764.review:
I'll get something out of the way first - my biggest pet peeve about RPGMaker games is the window size. For this game, it is tiny as hell, so the only way you can enjoy the game is in fullscreen which stretches the window somewhat. This initially bothered me so much that I delayed playing this game for a few months, despite purchasing it on release. I hoped maybe something would change in this regard, but nothing happened. I've played the game maybe for a minute and left it to collect dust.

But one day I finally decided to just go fullscreen and play it. And I'm glad I did because it's a solid game with a solid story. I don't really want to say much more, but I was gripped all the way through.

If you're the kind of player that enjoyed RPGMaker games like ib or The Witch's House, etc., you definitely don't want to miss out on this game.

Besides, the stretching is honestly not that noticeable once you play for a few minutes. I'm saying this as someone who was incredibly bothered by it at first, as you may have gathered a moment ago.

30487627.review:
In a nutshell: 
The premise is simple, but the story has its twists, and it is enjoyable.
The characters are lovable - they are well developed and interesting, especially the two main characters. (My other personal favourite was the doctor.)
The gameplay is mostly fun, though sometimes the controls felt a bit awkward.
I also liked the music, I think it suited the game rather well.
All In all, I can honestly recommend Angels of Death to those who enjoy dark themes, creepy characters, even creepier storyline and do not shy away from rpg maker games.

PS: If you have never tried any rpg maker game, this should be the first one.

30346978.review:
This is the pinnacle of story-telling that can be found in RPGMaker games. It managed to keep me enthralled in it the whole time I was playing it, making my eyes very pleased with the splendid art design and entertained me with its witty and charming dialogue and well-designed, interesting characters that can rival games like Alicemare and LiEat, (Both very good games, I suggest them if you like Angels of Death) and threw me for an emotional rollercoaster that had me smiling and laughing at Zack's expression, to sobbing and crying because of the story's compelling events. The writing and the visuals accented each other very well. 

However, it is a very niche game that only certain people will enjoy. The gameplay is comprised of puzzles that go from simple to average, and text boxes that can sometimes feel like they go on for half an hour. (Which they sometimes do, but I'm not at all complaining; I loved every second of it) Overall, if you like Psychological Horror and Story-Based games with some Strategy involved, this game will please you. 

The game does have flaws that are common in Japanese games translated into English, including grammatical and spelling mistakes, and some text boxes having words that go beyond the box and are unreadable, (I counted five, and all of them only cut off the last word of the sentence, making it not that much of a problem) and is almost exclusive to Zack. However, these are few and far-between and are hardly noticeable unless you are actively looking for them. The translators and programmers did very well. 

In case you want a brief verison: Amazing story and characters, with charming and witty dialogue that has very little grammatical and spelling mistakes, but is very niche and will appeal only to certain people.

稍微剧透一下结局：
[spoiler]最后瑞吉尔还是被札克带走了，愿望依然是请求札克杀了自己。 
但是札克只杀“露出幸福笑容，感到快乐的人”。像瑞吉尔这样一脸忧郁的少女，札克是无法下手的。
所以为了遵守一开始的这个约定，瑞吉尔和札克一起走了（私奔？）。

而札克则是为了遵守约定，拼命的想要让瑞吉尔笑出来，这样才能杀死他（札克只杀感到幸福的人）

两个人就这样，一直没法下手，一直在一起，虽然扭曲但却完美的结合在一起的一对。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]当最后月光下瑞吉尔躺在札克的怀抱里，把自己的一切都托付给了他，闭上眼恳求“请杀了我”时，札克的一句“所以，笑出来啊。”啊啊啊啊我简直看哭出来了，夹杂了多少复杂的感情在里面，可能这份萌生出来的感情，连单纯又愚笨的札克自己都没想到TAT[/spoiler]

剧情离谱也好 ，不合理也好，谜也好，都丝毫不影响这个游戏的魅力。
喜欢日式RPG，喜欢看B站岚少那种的，极力推荐。
顺便官方的漫画也超级棒，P站上的各种同人图也超级棒，有机会都去看看吧。
虽然荒诞，但却是个令人着迷的故事。

30230994.review:
A fantastic and well thought out game, Angels of Death (Japanese title 殺戮の天使) is the story of a young girl named Rachel Gardner, who is trapped in a building with a serial killer. What makes this unusual is that Rachel has little desire to leave the building, and in fact simply wants to die. She agrees to help the killer on the condition that he will kill her once they escape the building.
The story features interesting characters, fun puzzles and levels, and an emotion-filled, bittersweet ending. I highly recommend this game.

30073726.review:
Lots of people harbor disdain for RPGMaker titles, and for good reason. With the exception of a few gems like [i]To The Moon[/i], most of them aren't worth playing, with stock sprites, unoriginal story, poor world design, uninspired combat...

Thankfully, [i]Angels of Death[/i] has none of these. It's well-made enough to have garnered a sizable following among Japanese doujin game fans. At heart, it is a mystery story with similar "horror" vibes to [i]Alicemare[/i]. That is to say, it is more of a atmospheric/psychological horror game, without any real jumpscares or gore. Which is great, because I'm a queasy guy :<

(In case you're unaware, [i]Alicemare[/i] is a fantastic, cheap non-RPGMaker title on Steam. Also from the makers of [i]LiEat[/i]). 

Right at the start, you are introduced to Zack and Ray. They are lost in a mysterious facility filled with other psychopathic axe murderers. Zack happens to be one of them as well, underneath his edgelord bandaged exterior. Ray is a mysterious young girl who begs Zack to murder her. Zack promises to do so...only on the condition that she helps him escape. The game is split into 4 episodes, much like [i]LiEat[/i]. Be sure to play them in order!

The real meat of the game, and its most enjoyable aspect, lies in unravelling the mysteries behind the characters, with a strange and unlikely rapport building up between these two oddballs as the narrative progresses.
Both [i]Alicemare[/i] and [i]Angels of Death[/i] excel in this regard of storytelling - all the characters are genuinely likable and relatable in their dialogue and interactions. If you enjoyed one of them, I'm certain you'll enjoy the other as well.

In the end though, you still can't escape from the limitations of the RPGMaker engine. The game is locked at a miniscule resolution, with gritty pixel graphics. The puzzles that you have to solve are limited to the 2D physics engines of RPGMaker. Not that they aren't challenging or fun, but they aren't anything too novel.

The art isn't anything to write home about as well either. I'd label it as serviceable, for lack of a better word. Better than most RPGMaker titles out there, but [i]Alicemare[/i] has it cleanly beat on this level.

Overall, if you're after a quick dose of episodic psycho-horror + mystery story, [i]Angels of Death[/i] is a decent choice.
I still feel the price is a little high though - I could get both [i]Alicemare[/i] and [i]LiEat[/i] for $10. Considering that this game was released as freeware in Japan, you're essentially paying for 4 hours worth of in-game translation. Wait for a 50% sale?

약 4~6시간 정도의 플레이 타임을 가지고 있는 게임입니다
저는 약 6시간이 걸렸지만, 대화에서 집중 못하고 있다가 날린 시간이 대부분이네요 정말 플레이만 한다면 4시간이면 충분히 깰 수 있다고 생각합니다.

죽여주길 원하는 소녀와 살인마의 궁합은 괜찮았다고 생각 합니다(제 타입긴 합니다)

하지만 게임을 하면서 느낀 건 뜬금없는 스토리, 급전개, 이해할 수 없는 이야기들, 말을 하다가 끊어 버리는 캐릭터... 결국, 스토리는 포기하고 게임이나 하자 했더니 딱히 풀어야 할 퍼즐이 있는 것 아니고 그나마 죽을듯한 부분이라는걸 암시하듯 세이브가 나와서 기대하면서  플레이 해보면 '굳이 저장할 필요가 있었나..' 라는 말이 절로 나올 정도로(정말 플레이하면서 한번 죽었습니다.) 긴박감도 없고 위험도 없는 게 대부분이고 플레이 종종 나오는 BGM과 잭의 웃음소리..에 집중이 확 끊기게 됩니다. 또 플레이 도중에 선택이 나올 때 선택에 따라 반응이 다르겠지 싶어한 세이브들은 필요 없어지는 진행 덕분에 선택을 할 때 고민하는 즐거움도 없습니다. 
결국 플레이를 끝내고 나서 느낀 건 '아.. 내 돈..', '왜 이 게임이 인기 있을까?', '겨우 끝냈다'네요

스스로의 규칙으로 유명한 게임은 하지 않는 편이지만 변덕으로 구매한 게임입니다만 역시나 후회만 남는 선택이었습니다.  한국어판 나오기 전에 기대하시던 분들이 한둘이 아니고 한국어판이 나오면서 추천해주시는 분들도 많은 게임이었고 둘러보면 팬 그림이나 영상 등도 많이 있지만 사실상 왜 그렇게 유명한 게임이 된 것인지 모르겠습니다.

솔직한 감상을 말하자면 초보자용 게임, 맘에 드는 요소를 섞어 캐릭터를 만들다가 생각난 세계관을 게임으로 만들었다고 느껴지는 게임, 단순히 유행을 좋아하는 사람들이 주변 사람들이 이 게임을 추천하니까 자신도 재미있다고 생각하는 사람들이 모여 유명해진 게임이라고 느낍니다.

정말 맨 위에 쓰여 있는 부분들을 중요시하시는 분들이라며 정말로 플레이를 추천하지 않습니다.

30024626.review: Hey, I haven't posted a review in awhile (or ever for that matter), so I thought I'd share my experiences with this game because of how much I loved it  (and because I have nothing better way to spend my time on a saturday night). So, I guess I'll start out with the bads and then finish strong with the selling points of the game. One of the "meh" parts of the game is the soundtrack... It doesn't make me feel certain emotions when they're played as well as I'd like, and everything just sounds the same throughout the game, but not really... I'm not sure if that makes sense but whatever. Other minor flaws include annoying sfx that play too often, and the occasional typo in the dialogue. With the bad out of the way, lets talk about the stuff that makes this game SUPER FANTASTICLY AWESOMELY EPIC!!! I LOVE the characters, from their artwork to their dialogue, they all manage to keep me engaged till the very end. The story itself is pretty good too. The plot twist had me so off guard, and the ending is a real tear jerker! The game comes with a few minigames and some (simple) escape puzzles to keep the game feeling fresh until the very end. I don't know how to end one of these reviews so I'll just give a summary of a sort: It's not the perfect game ever, but the characters and story made up for what the game lacks. I highly reccomend this to anyone that is eager to play a new game, with a fantastic story and characters!

29908140.review:
Was ein absolut geiles und episches Spiel...
Ich hab das Game einfach im Angebot gesehen und habs mir geholt da ich dabei war einfach random Spiele zukaufen und sie mir anzugucken um vielleicht ein paar geile Geheimtipps zu finden. Und ich würde sagen absoluter Volltreffer, aber genug geschwärmt hier die Bewertung:

Spielstil: Schöner Spielstil mit echt netten WTF-Momenten, netten und sympatischen Charakteren  9,5/10
Atmosphäre: Echt Top, sehr autentisch mit einigen echten Gänsehautmomenten  9/10
Steuerung: Manchmal etwas ungenau oder zu schnell, grade beim weglaufen vllt etwas eigene Inkompetenz  8/10
Soundtrack: Hört ihn euch einfach an unbeschreiblich episch 10/10
Länge: Habe bis jezt nur die erste der 4 Episoden gespielt aber man kann mit einer Spielzeit von ca 2,5h pro Episode rechnen, was  für so einen Titel einfach nur gerechtfertigt ist.

Ein echt grandioses Spiel grade wenn man eigentlich sich von diesem Genre fernhält und da ich gar nichts erwartet habe bin ich einfach nur hin und weg. Kanns kaum erwarten dieses Meisterwerk weiterzuspielen.

29820149.review:
Before I say anything else, let me start off with a few words: this game is fucking amazing.

Now that that's out of the way, let me give you the nitty-gritty.


So, the premise of this game is that a girl wants to be killed and a serial-killer promises to do that after they make it out of this facility.

Now, at first, you might be wondering, "How good of a game could this possibly be with a premise like that?"
My answer to you, would be, "Trust me, it gets good."

At the outset (meaning most of the first episode), it may not seem as great as I make it out to be, but that's because it's not supposed to be like that so early. The main thing that makes this game great is a little thing called character-development. There is so much of it in this game, it's insane. You'd never think an emotionless 13 year old girl and a ruthless murderer would be such great and likeable characters, much less be a good team.

Honestly, the gameplay is secondary to the story besides maybe a few parts, so if you're thinking of playing it for gameplay, you might be disappointed. The story, however, is masterfully written and played out. The script is always entertaining, always brimming with character (though there are a lot of elipses, I must say). Even the non-main characters are interesting, and I say non-main characters because saying they're entirely supporting would be an insult. Every character plays a part in the story in a way. It's set up so that you'll understand some things better towards the end than when you first encounter them.

Oh, and the music is creepy, epic, emotional, or wacky whenever it needs to be, perfectly matching the situation. The art is also very original, not "original" as in disgusting to look at either, I mean original as in very well designed. It's not like there are too many hidden details within the character art, it's just really nice to look at.

This has become one of my favorite stories afrer playing through such a great game, the ending is perfectly suited to the story, that's all I'll say about it.

All in all, this is a great game. I'd even say it was 10/10. I'd definitely recommend if you have $10 to spend and want a masterpiece of a story.

매력적인 캐릭터들과 진행될 수록 점차 더 엔딩을 알고싶어지는 게임입니다 :)
제 인생에서 이 게임을 한 것은 축복이라고 생각될 정도로 퀄리티와 스토리가 완벽한 게임입니다.
전작 이슬비가 내리는 숲도 몹시 매력적이였는데 사나다 마코토씨의 이번 작인 살육의 천사는 정말 매력적이란 말로는 이루 다 표현할 수가 없네요.
얼핏 보면 비정상적인 약속이라고 생각될 수 있지만 그 선입견을 완벽히 부순 게임..개인적으로 정말 엔딩이 깔끔하다고 생각합니다. 어느 한쪽을 택했다면 아쉬움이 남았겠지만 그 둘이 아닌 다른 엔딩을 낸..엔딩이 감동적이면서 깔끔해서 몹시 좋습니다. 
이 게임을 살까 말까 고민하시는 분께 꼭 추천드리고 싶습니다.

살육의 천사를 플레이하고 다른 유튜버들의 영상들을 봤는데 대사에 부자연스러움울 발견했습니다. 그 중에서 에피소드2에 부자연스러운 대사가 많아 고쳐줬으면 좋겠습니다.
 
  1. '그렇네'라는 대사를 '응' 으로 고쳐 줬으면 좋겠습니다.
 '그렇네'보다는 '응'이 레이의 무뚝뚝한 성격을 잘 묘사할 수 있고 대사도 자연스러워져서 현장 몰입도 잘 됩니다.
 만약 고치기 힘드시다면 적어도 잭의 대사라도 '그렇네'를 '응'이라고 고쳤으면 좋겠습니다.
잭의 대사에서 '으그렇네?' 라든지 '흐그렇네'와 같은 대사는 좀 부자연스럽지만 '응'으로 고치면 
'으응?'과'흐응'과 같이 자연스러운 감탄사가 됩니다.

  2. 일부 대사에 나오는 '아니'를 '몰라'라고 고쳤으면 좋겠습니다. 
 - 레이와 잭이 머그샷을 찍을때의 잭의 대사

  레이:"셔터 누르면 찍히는 건가?"

  젝:[아니]->[몰라]

 - 독가스방에서 탈출하기 직전에 레이의 대사

  레이: ...하지만 성공할 수 있을 진 [아니]->[모르겠어]

  레이: ...이게 뜨거워지면 폭발. 할지도 [아니]->[몰라]

29624123.review:
[스포일러가 전혀 없는 좋은 리뷰]

진리의 문을 본 대가로 온몸에 붕대를 감고 전두엽을 잃은 불사신과 스트레스성 외상으로 인해 죽무새가 된 소녀, 크툰의 신도인 의사 선생님과 "소다... 오레가 키라다!" 라는 신념의 신천지 목사님과 함께라면 미친놈들이 도사리고 있는 살인 저택 따위 문제 되지 않습니다!

왜 제물들이 이 살인 게임에 참가하는지, 무슨 기준으로 제물을 선정하는지는 묻지 마세요! 어짜피 제물이라곤 주인공들이랑 시체들이 끝입니다! 시설 관리 시스템과 관리비를 생각해보면 한진에서 정말 좋아하겠군요! 당신들 누구... 읍읍!

이 게임에는 여타 쯔구루 게임이 보여준 선택지와 멀티 엔딩 따위 없습니다! 답정놉! 똑바로 해라 핫산. 너희 구매자들은 항상 말이 많아. 여긴 스팀이다 할인하면 무조건 사는 곳이지. 네놈들처럼 바라는게 많아선 결국 고오오오급 히오스로 회귀하게 된다는걸 모르겠나?!
애초 1~4 시나리오로 나눠져 있는 게임 파일 때문에 세이브 계승이 불가능합니다. 덕분에 엔딩에 영향을 전혀 못주니 선택지 고민을 할 필요가 없는데, 애초에 선택지가 없네? 에헤헿케케헼헤켛!

참고로 게임 난이도는 정말로 이용자 친화적입니다. 롤 티어가 브론즈인 저는 거리 14000밖에서 눈 앞으로 날아오는 애쉬 궁도 못피하지만. 이 게임에선 한 번도 죽은 적이 없습니다! (시나리오4에선 오질나게 죽었지만) 떠먹여주는 듯한 게임 난이도는 정말 제 인생에 있어 명강의였던 '사회봉사의 이해' 라는 인터넷 강의를 떠올리게 했습니다. 선생님 이름이 코노방구미와? 씨 였나 그랬던걸로 기억합니다. 아무튼 그 강의에서 C학점을 받았던게 기억나서 강의 평가에도 받은만큼 드렸는데, 이 게임도 받은만큼 드리고 싶습니다. 하하하하하!

이 게임의 스토리엔 정말 충격적인 반전이 있습니다. 너무 충격적이여서 구매하기 전에 이 평가를 보시는 분들은 정말 상상도 못할걸요? 계속 자신을 죽여죽여 백번 죽여줘 하는 죽무새가 요리조리 죽음을 피하면서 납탄 세례로 사람을 죽이는 살인자였다는 초보적인 기믹 따위는 절대 아닙니다 하하하하하핳!

이야~ 공포게임이라는 장르에 맞게 정말 스릴 넘쳤습니다. 설날에 자동차 창밖으로 보이던 엄청난 속도로 지나가는 가로등들과 맞먹을만큼 스릴 넘치는 게임이었습니다. 참고로 저는 크레이지 아케이드도 무서워서 못합니다. 친구 추천으로 시작한 오버워치에선 갈고리에 걸린 덕에 돌고래들과 대화하는 음역까지 올라갔더랬죠.

29579737.review:
As a game, this is a bit overpriced at around $10. Don't be mistaken, though - this is no mere game. This is a four episode anime in non-traditional OVA format, and as a four episode non-traditional OVA, it is well worth the price, and a great anime on top of it. Just know what you're getting into.

Pros:
1. Zack.
2. Well-timed wubs. There aren't a lot of wubs, but the wubs that are there are all very well-timed.
3. Peepers.

Cons:
1. It ends. It doesn't end badly. It's actually a great and personally really satisfying ending, but it still ends.
2. If you still think it's a game, it's pretty short, only 1-2 hours per episode. It's not a game, and that's standard time for an OVA, but there you have it.
3. Peepers.

If you want a numerical score, you'll find Frieza's power level to be varied depending on the source, but it's at least a million by his second form, and only goes up from there.

29578592.review:
This story cannot possibly get any darker, and I like that.

I like the relationship between Zach and Rachel. To be honest, this is a very creative setup. All the religious aspects conveyed in chapter 3 and 4 play well into the story.

Many elements of Japanese animes can be seen in this game. While people might say that's just cliche, the anime elements actually play well into this game.

The ending was not horrible, but it wasn't the best. The producer intentionally prolonged the last chapter. The story could have ended perfectly at several certain points, but just as you'd expect to see the credits, a new event takes place. This happened to me more than once in chapter 4.

Great soundtrack, must-hear contents.

I don't want to make any more undertale/lisa/earthbound references(cuz i've made too many already), I would recommend you play Angels of Death if you had played either of these games. However, if you like Fran Bow, then this is the game that you simply cannot miss.

P.S. Grammar should probably be fixed a little bit. I can get what the characters are saying but sometimes the conversations seem stiff probably because of inappropriate word choices. Big words/SAT words are used a tad bit too much lol.

Planning on a second play-through in Japanese and see how much I can understand lol

29457140.review:
Angels of Death est un jeu d'aventure/horreur fait avec un moteur type "RPG Maker" ou vous suivez les péripéties de Rachel Garner ou Ray ayant perdue la mémoire et qui se retrouve dans un batiment a plusieurs étages ayant chacun des épreuves bien particulières.

Je ne vais pas trop m'étaler sur l'histoire ,pour éviter le spoil, car le scénario est l'interet principal du jeu, celui ci étant très bien raconté surtout avec les différents personnages originales que l'on va croiser tout le long de l'aventure.
Angels of Death est beaucoup plus axés sur l'histoire et l'ambiance que sur les énigmes, celles ci étant assez simples de plus qu'on a le droit de sauvegarder avant chaque épreuve mortelle.

Le jeu est coupé en 4 épisodes de 2h environ soit a peu près 8h de jeu ce qui est plus que raisonable vu la qualité du titre.

Je le recommande a tout ceux qui ont aimé ces jeux du genre IB, Mad Father ou the Witch House et a ceux qui ne sont pas repoussé par les graphismes "old school" et qui aiment les bons jeux d'horreur avec une ambiance et des personnages bien travaillés et une histoire ou on ne s'ennuie pas.
Ce jeu fait partie du top des jeux d'horreur "RPG/Wolf Maker" avec ceux précédemment cités. Je signale que le jeu est qu'en Anglais mais qu'il demande un niveau correct si l'on veut faire le jeu.


Points positifs :
-Une très bonne aventure horrifique plus dans la psycologie des personnages que sur le gore et les jumpscares, que du bon.
-Bonne ambiance et scénario alletant, on veut connaitre la suite a la fin de chaque épisode. Le final est superbe sa faisait longtemps que je n'avais pas fait un jeu avec une histoire aussi prenante.
 [spoil]Vu le final et les éventuels survivants on aura peut etre une suite qui sait...[/spoil]
-Personnages principaux attachants et secondaire complétements fous ayant chacun une personalité bien différente.
-Une bonne qualité sonore pour le moteur utilisé.

Points négatifs :
-Des soucis de son lors de la boucle de la musique, on entends nettement la coupure surtout sur les premiers épisodes.
-Pas moyen de régler la résolution, sa pique un peu les yeux en plein écran et c'est beaucoup trop petit de base. Les dessins des personnages dans les fenetres de dialogues en prennent un coup visuellement.
-Pas de réglage de son, très fort de base meme après avoir réglé sur windows.
-Pas tellement de choix, le jeu est très linéaire de ce coté si.

29412116.review:
My gosh! Never thought this game would become one of my favourite stories.
Firstly I got the game cos I like horror themed RPG indie looking games.
Then I started playing, this seems nice I hope it gets good.
HOT DAMN DID IT GET GOOD!!!
It just got better and better.
As things happen more questions appear, things you WANT to know, it keeps you hooked.
Every night before I'd go to bed I'd have two choices, sleep or play some more? Everytime, "I gotta play more, I want to know, I want to be back in that world!"

Story 9/10:
Wow just wow. Like how wine gets better with age, the story gets better with duration of play. It starts off simple everything isn't hectic and you get the bearing of what's going on. As the story progresses things start to heat up and the pace becomes something you can really get into. Nothing I feel is rushed out of necessity. More could have happened but I am very pleased with what I got.

Characters 8/10:
It was a good mix, some characters I really liked as more and more info came a float and made them more fleshed out. There was emotion of every kind. Some characters could have done with a little more fleshing out or maybe not. How the story went it's a little debatable. Some characters were nothing short of suprises.

Soundtrack 8/10:
Beautiful. Some of the tracks worked quite well but a couple really made me feel emotions fitting to what was going on. It made me understand the characters and story more which formed a connection to these characters.

Enjoyment 10/10: Like I mentioned before I had to play more of the game, it was so exciting, enjoyable and something to really get into.

Anything bad? Well sorta but it's nothing major I feel. There's only so far you can take graphics and animation in an RPG pixel game. To be honest that's what makes it unique. Sure it could have been done in better graphics and animation, but it's not something desired. I liked the art style it was done in and that was enough for me.
I also thought the game could have been a little longer as I finished semi-quickly, but again I don't think it needed to be longer. It's not some huge budget game with world building factors. It's length fitted it nicely. I think it was the feeling of "oh, it's over... I want more." But when you feel like that it's a sign of a really good game. :)

Overall thoughts:
Great story, great soundtrack and great characters.
I am very pleased with spending money on this game. Definatly worth a buy.
Thoughts and fanart of this game won't be dissapearing anytime soon.
It has it's cons but the pros out weigh the cons by a ton. I know this game isn't perfect, there are things I wanted to happen or be different, but so does everything. I know this game wont be for everyone, some might disagree with me completely and that's fine. Everyone to their own right?

If you feel like you can spend that small amount then I highly recommed it. 
Find out will you enjoy this game as much as I did or will it be be a flop?

29408192.review:
An unexpectedly captivating horror game, Angels of Death took me by surprise. I picked it up thinking it might be along the lines of Corpse Party (which I thoroughly enjoyed), only to find it was something quite different. And yet, still quite enjoyable!

You play as Rachel Gardner, a girl trapped in some strange building with stranger people and the strangest things happen. All of it is quite strange, really. Her goal, which should be obvious, is to escape the strange building. Her success falls on your hands.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The game plays much like any other RPG Maker game does. Your controls are fairly basic, with a button for the menu, a button to interact, and a button to run faster. I played this game on an XBOX 360 controller, because I found it easier than the keyboard. 

The game shifts from adventuring to escaping to puzzling throughout the story. One minute you may be figuring out how to open a door, the next you may be running for your life. Thankfully, the game is very kind and gives you an opportunity to save before every event that may result in your death. Still, there were a few events where I got frustrated from having to retry five or six times to get the timing just right.

[h1]Story[/h1]
The story is definitely engaging overall, but there were times where certain lines of dialogue and exchanges would make me do a double-take, as if they made no sense for the character or the setting. Still, the ending took me for a surprise and I found myself eager to keeping moving forward throughout the entire game.

The game is episodic (sort of), divided into 4 chapters. The only way to switch from one chapter to the next was to quit the game and relaunch it, and select your chapter from the launcher. That was a bit of an annoyance, to be sure.

Oh, and the story seems to be set up where you would be given some pivotal choices that impact the ending. Cool, right? Except you don’t actually get to make the choices. The game makes them for you. So that was disappointing.

[h1]Why I hated it[/h1]
I’m going to cut this review down to two sections instead of three, simply because the game was so short, and jump right to my favourite part: Why I hated it!

The graphics in the game were a little unnerving, especially the hand drawn character portraits. While they weren’t necessarily poor artwork, something was a little off. 

Also, I was not a fan of the way the game teased you about having choices to make, and then laughing in your face when you were railroaded into one choice. 

[h1]Final Recommendation[/h1]
It was fun. I enjoyed it, overall. I’ll probably not play it again, but for 10 bucks I would say I got value for my money. It’s worth it - if you like creepy games.

29362977.review:
You have no idea how long I've been awaiting for this game to finally be released and translated. Ever since seeing fan art to it around on the web; I've been keeping up to date with the updates to it on the Japanese vers. but had NO idea what I was even reading. The manga is now translating, slowly if interested. Now that I saw that it was available on steam, I was quite excited to purchase it once Christmas arrived. Whole reason I bothered to re-install Steam honestly, haha. Anyways, onto my review:

Satsuriku no Tenshi; also known as Angels of Death is probably one of the best indie psycho horror games I've played yet by RPGMaker. The characters are loveable, especially the two main leads, Rachel and Zack. It gives dark humor, yet a bit of heart-warming feels as you go through the story to the game. Coming from the creator to "The Forest of Drizzling Rain", I'd say it is well worth a try if you enjoy indie horror games. Although there's really no jump scares included compared to the other RPGMakers; it is still very much worth to try out. I feel as if there are more challenging 'mini-games' included compared to others I've played. The soundtrack is amazing and fits perfectly in pace of everything occuring in the game. I couldn't bare myself to stop playing as an episode was completed. 5-7 hrs or more altogether if going slow at it like I did. I wouldn't recommend the game if you can't stand reading whatsoever at all. But most games do consider that nowadays, no? :P

Overall; my rating for this game is a 10/10. Masterpiece well done and can see why it is considered one of the most popular indie horror games in Japan. You will not regret purchasing this game.

29308152.review: I consider myself pretty knowledgeable when it comes to horror related media, especially games, and I can honestly say that when it comes to story lines, this has been one of the best gaming experiences I’ve ever had. I have not felt this emotionally attached to a game since silent hill 2 or more recently Fran Bow. I have played very few RPGs of this kind (really only one), but found the gameplay to be immersive in a way I didn’t expect, even more so than many of the “higher graphic” games I have played, and while I could continue about the gameplay I think what stood out for me, and made this a really special experience was the relationship between Rachel and Zach and their interactions with each other as well as the whole story line put together. What was really exciting about this for me was that there was this cute relationship building between these two polar opposite characters and so many funny and “aww” moments (which is important to me because I’m a girl and like that kind of thing), but you were still in this world full of blood and gore and mayhem and it still managed to be terrifying and creepy AF at the same time. That is a very hard balance to achieve, and this game delivered on every level. I honestly didn’t want it to end. In conclusion, this game is amazing, and I sincerely hope that more media ( like the manga and novel) are translated into English, so I can stop longingly looking at the Japanese scans, hoping that the story can one day continue for me.

29303014.review:
Pros:

+Interesting and surprisingly emotional Story that does not follow any cliches. A bonus for people who like dark stories with dark humour.
+You'll find yourself liking all of the characters, The 2 MCs are actually complex in their own regards, especially Ray. The other characters they go against have their own little charm.
+The whole setting itself entertaining, like a screwed up survival game testing you in different ways, depending on the owner of the floor.
+ Games gives you leeway with it's puzzles such as auto saves which is useful if you are the type that sucks at puzzles and chase scenes and so on.

Cons:
-That being said, the puzzles for me tended to be a bit too easy. The game gives you several hints which is good but at times it's to the point where it almost tells you what to do. I never really felt scared of losing in any threatening puzzles or think that much on how to solve them.

Overall, this is a game with great characters, a fun and emotional story near the end. It's definitely worth the money.

29232891.review:
This is a really good rpg. I wouldn't quite comsider it "horror", more as adventure.
 -It follows a pretty good story with, for the most part, good characters. I don't really think it is a "love" story, maybe more of a "older brother younger sister" relationship.
 -In my opinion it ends nicely (that's not saying it's a good or bad ending, I mean that there aren't too many loose ends or questions about characters or past events by the end). 
-The puzzle's really range in difficulty no matter how far you are in the game.
 -Now, the game is split into 4, meaning that thre isn't much room for punishments. It's very straightforward in the fact that if you mess up the only punishment you get is death. 
-The music is good anf really matches the tone of the game.
All in all this game is really good and if you like love stories based around death and psychopaths you'll love this.

29159636.review:
Angels of Death is a great game, by a great writer. The art is very nice, especially cut in artwork during certain scenes or during the end of each games credits. The music is very good as well! At least, if you're a fan of dubstep like me, otherwise the overload of wub wubs might annoy some? The story is the highest point of the game though. If you're a fan of escape games, I think you'd like this sort of game.  Though the game has a nice twist of an edge to it: the main character wants to die, and teams up with a serial killer in order to escape a place filled with people that could kill her. In order for him to kill her.

 It may, on paper, sound weird, but as you play it, it's very understandable. The main characters Ray and Zack have very deep personalities and a dark past, so much I wanted to see more and more that makes them tick. The escape rooms all have something unique to them and all offer a challenge without being overtly hard. I especially liked Chapter 3's punishment rooms, most notably the poison room. It made me feel smart and accomplished having found out how to escape. 

The game handles some really dark subject matter, if it weren't obvious by the fact one of the main characters is a serial killer. There are things such as death, suicide, animal death, and gruesome imagery all about the game. As an animal lover especially, the scenes concerning those disturbed me a lot to where i'd have to take a break sometimes. Especially a certain part  in Chapter 4... If you can stomach that, then you'll be met with a very nice and deep story, that still amazes me on how it ended. Some people may find the ending unsatisfactory, but I felt it was the best way a story of this nature should have ended. Any other way, and I feel it would be disappointing.

There are of course, some problems with the plot, in a way that there are some points that felt overlooked, and needed to be explained. Otherwise as is, they feel like plot devices. The english translation, while not TERRIBLE, definatelly need some... changes. Jeepers Peepers Danny! That said, Playism is taking critisism for the translation and is likely to do a patch in the near future to fix that, along with, i hope, the few times the text went off the screen, unreadable.

I think if you're a fan of  games in the veign of things like Mad Father, Alice_mare, Ib, etc, you definately need to play this game, It's one of the best out there.

29132513.review:
Alright....where do I begin?

1st impressions: I was really into this game just from the brief description and the few screenshots provided when I saw it in the "upcoming" game section. I have been really into "RPG horror" games as of late and this seemed like another one I might like. (I'm really into psychological horror in general.)

So, at 1st, I was kinda bored. Sad to say. It has quite a slow start. Chapters 1 and 2 aren't extremely interesting. I found myself not caring about the characters at all and Rachel repeating how much she wanted Zack to kill her, got really annoying, real quick. Yes, we get it. Move on already. I kept going though because I wanted to see what happens.

Now, chapters 3 and 4 were when I *really* started getting into this game. The story was unfolding and you learn more and more about Rachel and Zack and their relationship together. I can't say I started *caring* about them at this point though. Rachel still repeated herself as always. Though I did enjoy when Zack told her to shut up. XD Oh and Zack, if he wasn't a serial killer, he woulda been a  really cool dude. But no, I couldn't really ignore that while playing. These are also decently long chapters, so don't worry about this game being short.

The story implemented the *somewhat* overused religious aspect of horror games as well, but in it's own way. As you keep finding out about what really happened, you find it's pretty distrubing. I always find that facinating in these types of games though. It always keeps you quessing and doesn't give a clear answer right away. 

Anyway, I liked it. Totally recommened. Just know that the story doesn't really kick off until chapter 3, like I said. And there's quite a bit of reading. Not too many puzzles and even then, they're not difficult. Also, the ending was a bit unfullfilling, but no matter. 4 chapters and about 7+ hours of gameplay. Good game. =)

Oh! And the music is really great! =D
